00030         today = (int) tw_now(lp) / 86400;
00031         i_time = (int) tw_now(lp) % TWENTY_FOUR_HOURS;
00032 
00033         // if the time is before 9:00 AM and the next move is at or before
00034         // 9:00 AM, then send type 2 event so num will not set a timer
00035         // for nine oclock that will be cancelled by next move.
00036         // Cannot just ignore event, because num needs midnight event
00037         // to calculate daily statistics.
00038         if(i_time < NINE_OCLOCK || i_time >= 6120000)
00039                 return;
00040 
00041         // only send if home
00042         if(a->loc[0] != lp->id)
00043                 return;
00044 
00045         // only invoke network user model every Nth day
00046         if(g_epi_mod > 1 && (today % g_epi_mod) + 1 != g_epi_mod)
00047                 return;
00048         if(g_epi_nreport_days > 0)
00049         {
00050                 if ( today+1 != g_epi_report_days[g_epi_next_report_day])
00051                         return;
00052         }
00053

00055 
00056         m = tw_event_data(e);
00057         m->ttl = 1;
00058 
00059         rn_event_send(e);
